entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
